name: Paul's Really epic fun guessing game Pre-release
name_original: Paul's Really epic fun guessing game Pre-release
description:
Hello i am sansnic here and i am here to show you a other mod that i have been working on and it is just a prerelease and it took a very long time to get finished so i desided to do a prerelease of it so yeah and this is a normal 1.4.3 mod in a long time so this is not a decompile

Changes planned in the prereleases and in the final version of the mod

ADD placeface in the school in the 2nd prerelease and also more sounds and textures in to it as well as some more coding so yeah about that i will be doing a lot of gameplay videos on youtube and modding so i will not work on this all of the time but i am trying to finish it at lest 

CREDITS!!!!!!!

Moldy and mastergeorge - for the think your art project code in math pad

Siroofy90 - inspaired by his mods

Leo - inspaired by leo's basics

Thebaldimodder452 - Font

youtube - for music

alright see ya next time and as always see you in the next mod and game i will make also follow me on twitter and itch.io for more mods and also i will leave now BYE!!!
